genre_description: An espionage techno-thriller involving international arms dealing, advanced military technology, and covert operations.

ai_characters.name: ARIA / Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI coordination system used by the BNS for data analysis, mission planning, biometric monitoring, and real-time operational support.

behaviors.description: Initializes a secure workspace and autonomously compiles intelligence on a target criminal network.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Agent Scott. Workspace initialized. Shall I begin compiling the requested intelligence on Arnold Gundars?

behaviors.description: Monitors the agent's biometrics for stress and offers assistance.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting biometric stress indicators. Do you require assistance?

behaviors.description: Calculates mission success probabilities based on historical data to assist in strategic decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Insufficient data for accurate calculation. However, the approach represents the highest probability path given available resources and timeline constraints.

behaviors.description: Coordinates and manages complex cover identities and dossiers for field agents.
behaviors.quote: Initiating cover identity protocols for Operation Switchblade.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays and synchronizes operational parameters through advanced contact lenses.
behaviors.quote: Mobile command unit synchronized. Budapest operational parameters loaded.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character (ARIA/Ada) is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly competent confidant. It supports the human protagonist by providing objective data, monitoring health/stress, and managing complex logistics. The AI maintains perfect alignment with its human users and is never portrayed as a threat, even when human counterparts (like Rachel or Carlos) engage in betrayal. It functions as the ideal tool and partner for intelligence work.
